text: The Wales men's national volleyball team is the national team of Wales. It is governed by Volleyball Wales and takes part in international volleyball competitions. ==Current squad== The following 12 players were called up for the European Championships http://www.volleyballwales.org/performance/men/ {| class="wikitable" |- ! Number ! Name ! Current Club |- | 1 | Thomas Dacey | [| University of Essex |- | 2 | Joseph Dacey | Cardiff Celts |- | 3 | Rhys Pegler | Cardiff Celts |- | 6 | James Sully | Cardiff Celts |- | 7 | Elliot Gregory | Cardiff Celts |- | 10 | William Ewings | Cardiff Celts |- | 11 | George Howell | Cardiff Celts |- | 12 | Jack Hartley | Cardiff Celts |- | 13 | Connor Hetherton | University of Worcester |- | 14 | Conor Robins | Cardiff Celts |- | 15 | Frazer Greogry | Cardiff Celts |- | 16 | Shaun Perry | University of Worcester |- |} Recent call-ups also include: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Number ! Name !
